trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element which enables <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> elements (i.e. a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a InlineUIContainer (see example below).
An InlineUIContainer may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
However, the child element hosted by an InlineUIContainer may host children of its own.
Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> element.
A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
This parameter may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> is inserted.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> element after it is created, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no automatic insertion.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> may host children of its own.

In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the Child property.
